allTitles: {"en":"About Coronavirus","id":"Tentang Virus Corona","lts":"Olumbe lwa Korona","wms":"Virus Koronatak"}

4.wms: Virus Koronane andagamondik komegemat eptage gogopwe dominugo luk nombongga sanggomo katkenaknantak

13.wms:
Wambemo kamgenakna. 
Kamge 2 metetkenaknandik  asin asinamalo walokge dano gogopwe lawogettoe.

17.wms: Golo gogopwe hetaknano kapwe Apyokgup koyo hiwagilokgup koyo yayunggup kegetle nemanuna:

18.wms:
Yagoptage masketle nandakna.
Emanunano  yagopwe hiwagilokdik  goyo apyokdik ewe masket topka asinano sinimo manggopwe lawontakdoe.

22.wms: Nombono kapwe epmo yayune tembetik, do ego andit wambemomopsigi masket haloge.

23.wms: Viruskola lawatbono kapwe tepwe lapbesanmono goge katkenagettoendik, ego yayune kamo lapkomemomoge.

24.wms: Mitkuptage, awopdikga  yayunggup denopwe gogopwe amokgolo,  matet baline kap dagit talokge kanaget.

38.wms: Emandik, yayuno kapko walokge nombenbep taloga lawomoge…

42.wms: Gogopwe manggopdoega, ewo mane baunbelo dako ga kelopkalit,

43.wms: Matetbaline ewo imakeman ambatle sabungga goyo baikilin okga goyo alkoholo okga  ogogopnunandikga viruse tembetkemoge.

44.wms: Viruse kenonggo imakeman ambat taloga bageno kitipke satkemo satkelopwe 24ke motomgemoge.

51.wms:
Gogo kelopkalitle laphetkonage.(Koyo awopko kelopkalitkup laphetkonaget.)
Emamomopkegetle bisitle sabungga ogokmonagano bokge tembetkendik.

61.wms: Masketle ugumgegenano motomgetkegele bokge ephalo bage amit kawemoge.

62.wms: Gogo masketle bokgegenggegele sanun ka. Masketle ugumgenano satle duminuk laphalondoe.

68.wms: Andemowo, bilin sendokgo, okdimo, handokgomanepwe ketopdak-ketopdak monaget.

69.wms: Bisit munggupkane gogo kelopkalilo bisit mungguwo ewe lawonagetoe, lapnamatkegetle ka emanuna.

70.wms: Lapkitmonamatkegetle, aptop gelendetle bisit munggupka goyo manlingga bakbet katombetnuna.

74.wms: Gogo bisitle alipkup satkup sabungga ogopnuna…

80.wms: Kitanggutlo lukge tulepon luk tatalokga etakgo katkenakna!

81.wms: "This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)

82.wms: "The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. (Jan25, 2020)

83.wms: "How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands", Elizabeth Rosenthal, in New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020)

84.wms: Obat dagonano hinggenamokdeno manggop takgo luk kanetopdik:

85.wms:
Kitanggutlo takbukman: Buku komik nombone yayun kitanggutla asinggp hiwagilonggup wambemomopsigindik. Gupwe yayune tembetik, nombono lukge alipkup satkup lapkitmalenggegle, yayun kitanggut talokge wambemomat. Referensi: Komik nombephalono COVID-19 sigino luk ewe yanggumalembone kogeno 28 Februari 2020 getbono buku tagemgup nekilep epka lawo oplawo ugumalembo.  https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.html https://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/   https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Informasi kitanggut: Komik nombone PDFka okmalembone nombephalo lawomoge: https://gumroad.com/weimankowart  Komik lawomowo yandit: Nombono Komikge gupwe wasi lawomat. Whatsapp kanggoyo Face Book talokga lapelo, ap talokgup, sekola talokgup, keleman talokgupka hetago kinggopmompsigindik. 
Komik nombone dagatmomalo topwe tagemgupwo luk nombe hetago katkenak:  1. Komik top nombono bagetle laphamoget.  2. Komik nombone halonano tagetka takbikmomop sigindikdoe. 3. FB talokga dagatmomopkegele, nombono hitkup oknu: @weimankowart (IG), koyo link instagram.com/weimankow 
Odo luk kitanggula hetago lapkitmomopwe  Nombono situpka luk hanotna kan: comicsforgood@gmail.com

Wambon Dumut

Olumbe lwa Korona
bookText.wms:
Virus Koronatak



Virus Koronane andagamondik komegemat eptage gogopwe dominugo luk nombongga sanggomo katkenaknantak

KOMEGEGE

Bonop

Kalit

Kelop

Kute etomat

Hinbalino
kap
Yayuno kap

Nemamo asin selenggetkandige viruse komegemat
Wambemo kamgenakna. 
Kamge 2 metetkenaknandik  asin asinamalo walokge dano gogopwe lawogettoe.
1
2m-0,5m
Ahi!!

Golo gogopwe hetaknano kapwe Apyokgup koyo hiwagilokgup koyo yayunggup kegetle nemanuna:

Yagoptage masketle nandakna.
Emanunano  yagopwe hiwagilokdik  goyo apyokdik ewe masket topka asinano sinimo manggopwe lawontakdoe.
2
Matetik *SROOT*
KOYO
Nombono kapwe epmo yayune tembetik, do ego andit wambemomopsigi masket haloge.
Viruskola lawatbono kapwe tepwe lapbesanmono goge katkenagettoendik, ego yayune kamo lapkomemomoge.

Mitkuptage, awopdikga  yayunggup denopwe gogopwe amokgolo,  matet baline kap dagit talokge kanaget.

Andemop simbit

Hinbalino kap

Taksi topka lapdimo elan

Halik tombot

Tisu

Oktdim

Elektronik ambat

Masket mote besan nemet talok

Halik talokgo lapdiman

Mous

Botpen

Aptop gelendet

Yago bisit

Emandik, yayuno kapko walokge nombenbep taloga lawomoge…

Emamane gogop mitkupwe yayumonamat.
Koyo gogp sinimo manggopko kelopkalit

Koyo kelopwe lawo hopkotman

Gogopwe manggopdoega, ewo mane baunbelo dako ga kelopkalit,

Matetbaline ewo imakeman ambatle sabungga goyo baikilin okga goyo alkoholo okga  ogogopnunandikga viruse tembetkemoge.

Viruse kenonggo imakeman ambat taloga bageno kitipke satkemo satkelopwe 24ke motomgemoge.

Sabun
nombemanyepmo viruse haloganuna.
Ewoptakgolo, datlo lapkitman epdikge matetkayan

Sabungga ogoknonagano nombephalonggen.
Sabun
Bisit munggup

Gogo kelopkalitle laphetkonage.(Koyo awopko kelopkalitkup laphetkonaget.)
Emamomopkegetle bisitle sabungga ogokmonagano bokge tembetkendik.

“Kawetbono talomo” gome ligenano motomgemogen yepkentak.

Bisit muktop

Kogeno 20 detikgentak

Bisit talon kakmontop

Bisit atat mimbanggup okgok betik

Bisitle andagambetik okgokmogenano bokge tembetkemat?

Lapwalenggegetle wasi sabungga bisit ogoknuna.

Masketla mote besane lawonaget

Walok hotgon

Masketle ugumgegenano motomgetkegele bokge ephalo bage amit kawemoge.

Gogo masketle bokgegenggegele sanun ka. Masketle ugumgenano satle duminuk laphalondoe.

Sendok kuakga

Amit

Bap

Nayop

Handokge egepkup-egepkup kenuna

Andemowo, bilin sendokgo, okdimo, handokgomanepwe ketopdak-ketopdak monaget.
Bisit munggupkane gogo kelopkalilo bisit mungguwo ewe lawonagetoe, lapnamatkegetle ka emanuna. 

Lapkitmonamatkegetle, aptop gelendetle bisit munggupka goyo manlingga bakbet katombetnuna.

AP
Ap kanamalo topka

Andenamalo topka

Gogo bisitle alipkup satkup sabungga ogopnuna…

Batgotop

Sabun
Wambembetik hinbalingga nambo!

Wambembetik hinbalingga nambo!

Sabun
Kitanggutlo lukge tulepon luk tatalokga etakgo katkenakna!
"This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)
"The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. (Jan25, 2020)
"How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands", Elizabeth Rosenthal, in New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020)
